text: The integration must allow developers to write and test GraphQL queries seamlessly within markdown blocks.
Markdown shortcuts (e.g., `**bold**`, `# headers`) must remain fully functional outside of the GraphQL code blocks.
Within these code blocks, the editor should support Ctrl + Space for GraphQL schema hints and IntelliSense.
Development should start Monday, with a working PoC ready for review by Friday.
This feature will improve DX when documenting APIs that use GraphQL by enabling inline query testing and formatting.
